content.raw: That's a good thought. I'm not sure what the best solution is. In Illustrator, the swatch palette can remain open at all times, but when creating a new swatch from a color picker, the color picker is modal so it must be closed before you're able to apply the color. I don't foresee a problem with making the color picker modeless in this case. Seems convenient to allow users to Add to Custom Colors, apply the color to the scene, and (still in the color picker) repeat with a new color.
